TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProduceIdTransform extends Microsoft.ML.Data.RowToRowTransformBase
Public NotInheritable Class ProduceIdTransform Inherits RowToRowTransformBase

Docs.summary:
Produces a column with the cursor's ID as a column. This can be useful for diagnostic purposes.
This class will obviously generate different data given different IDs. So, if you save data to some other file, then apply this transform to that dataview, it may of course have a different result. This is distinct from most transforms that produce results based on data alone.
